Gonzaga's Jalen Suggs shoots a long 3-pointer to beat UCLA at the Final Four on Saturday. The buzzer-beater gave the Bulldogs a 93-90 overtime win.
Updated 11:56 PM ET, Sat April 3, 2021

articles.title: Rapper DMX is hospitalized and on life support following heart attack, longtime lawyer says
articles.description: Rapper DMX is hospitalized and on life support at a hospital in White Plains, New York, his longtime attorney Murray Richman confirmed to CNN.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ancient mummies are paraded through the streets of Cairo
articles.description: Ancient mummies of Egypt's royal pharaohs emerged from their resting places Saturday and were paraded through the streets of Cairo in search of a new home.
articles.content:

articles.title: Australia's first international cricket team found fame in the UK. At home, they were betrayed
articles.description: Until recently, most Australians didn't know anything about the journey that took 13 Aboriginal cricketers from farmsteads in Victoria to England in 1868 -- making them Australia's first sporting team to play overseas.

articles.title: Lori Loughlin's husband Mossimo Giannulli released from prison
